name: 張素薰
objective: 本課程著重於高級聽力與口說能力之培養，使學生之聽講能力訓練進階至主題式的學習. 教材提昇至多元化之主題，包括商業、貿易、法律、政治、社會、文化、觀光等層面。教法上強調生動的多媒體輔助與高效的演練，針對以上教材主題，訓練學生聽取他人語言意涵及口語表達能力。此外，希望藉由此訓練，培養學生學習的策略，進而對自我學習產生負責的態度。
schedule:
Syllabus for 4E1 Multimedia English Listening and Speaking, 2011(2)
Week	Classification 	English News	Friends
1	Introduction
2	Politics	1. Cabinet re-shuffle brings in new blood along with a familiar mix of old faces (2012/01/31)	1
3		2. Experts add to debate over allowing Paylean (2012/02/03)	2
4	Health	3. Disclosure of unborn babies’ sex banned by Department of Health (2011/12/30)	3
5		4. DOH sets up 23 flu clinics and calms fears about expired Tamiflu (2012/01/03)	Stage Play
6	Life	5. Dermatologist warns against excessive use of thermal clothing (2012/01/31)	4
7		6. Taipower fined NT$15 million for nuclear plant infractions (2012/01/17)	5
8	Transportation	7. eTag to be rolled-out across Taiwan after Lunar New Year (2012/01/18)	6
9		Powerpoint Presentation: A Formal Briefing about (a man, a woman, a product, a building, an event…)
10		8. President Ma lists achievements while inspecting Songshan Airport (2011/12/01)	7
11	Business	9. Storefront on Zhongxiao East Rd. sells for record price per square meter (2012/01/19)	8
12		10. Chemistry professor warns of potential eating hazards (2011/12/16)	9
13	Entertainment	11. Taipei 101 promises 3D feel for New Year’s fireworks show (2011/12/22)	Demonstration
14		12. City promises more exhaust fans for troubled underground food court (2011/12/27)	10
15	Traveling	13. The US considers waiving visa requirements for Taiwanese travelers (2011/12/23)	11
16		14. Alishan Forest Railway celebrates its 100th anniversary (2011/12/25)	12
17		Powerpoint Presentation
18	Final Report
scorePolicy:
Evaluation:
1.	Weekly Tests and appearance, one absence being reduced two points. 80%
2.	Presentations and Reports. 20%
